paras.paraDetail:
Using this app you can access to the most incredible classified marketplace in country, where you can buy, search, and sell many different products on the go. UpLinkMarket doesn’t limit you in terms of the goods that you can buy or sell. It allows you to sell motorcycles, vehicles, electronics, and so much more. What’s more, if you’re interested in selling, buying, or renting a property, or posting or searching for a job within the country or overseas, you can find it all on UpLinkMarket.

Explore listings in categories like:

paraDetail: You can sell and buy new and used electronics, such as cameras, television sets, tablets, phones, laptops, video games, lighting equipment, audio gear, gaming consoles, etc.
You can compare the prices of similar products and find accessories, such as phone casings and adapters.
You can sell and buy new and used buses, vans, scooters, motorcycles, boats, and heavy-duty vehicles.
UpLinkMarket allows you to compare the prices of all vehicle brands, including Honda, Hyundai, Mitsubishi, Toyota, Mazda, Nissan, and Kia, etc
Getting to the listings you want is easy since you can filter your search by price range, mileage, model year, brand, condition, etc.
You can shop for parts and accessories for your vehicle too.
UpLinkMarket allows you to sell, buy, and rent property easily.
You can search for land, commercial property, houses, flats, and apartments while filtering your search by location, price, condition, etc.
You can compare the prices of similar property listings easily.

paras.paraDetail:
Browse thousands of local ads with UpLinkMarket – an easy-to-use mobile app. You can do your search by the listing location, category, and keywords, so you can find precisely what you want. Buyers get to communicate with sellers and make deals to purchase listings easily. Buyers can save the listings they want to buy later to view later.

You can promote your ads using Bump Up and Top Ads to get them to sell faster. You can find all categories that you want right inside UpLinkMarket. Posting and managing ads is easy right from your phone. UpLinkMarket consumes very little data.

You can download the free app right now and have the marketplace in your palm.

Welcome!

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How do I post an ad?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: You can easily post your ad; Just tap on the the plus (+) icon & then login and submit your ad with proper data. You will get a notification after submitting your ad.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How do I edit/delete my ads?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Simply login and go to Account => my listing & you will get a list of your ads. Each ad has delete option

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How to edit my ad?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Simply login and go to Account => my listing & you will get a list of your ads. Each ad has edit option

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How many days my ads will remain active?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: It depends on your settings how many days the listing will active depends on it ads will be visible

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How many ads can I post for free?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: It depends on your settings on website seller will get no of free ads to post for certain no of days.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How can I edit my account information?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Login then go to my account, you will get your account information edit option

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How to start chat with someone?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Go to detail of an ad; you will get email, phone and chat option. Just tap the chat icon and start your conversation.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Will I get chat notifications as a Seller?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Yes. For chat request or email, seller will get an email notification. For chat, buyer will get first initial message as email notification.

sellFastTips.title: Pick the right price
sellFastTips.detail: Price is a big factor for customer who purchase the item. So before setting the price visit similar ads and set a reasonable and competitive price.

sellFastTips.title: Use great photos
sellFastTips.detail: Use clear & actual photos of your product/products. You can use multiple images from different view so buyer will get more clear idea about your item/items.

sellFastTips.title: Provide clear description
sellFastTips.detail: Provide clear and detail description of your product. Make sure you've added right information about your items.

moreOptions.title: اتصل بنا
moreOptions.detail: If you face any problem or did not find the answer to your question in frequently asked question swction, please feel free to contact us.

moreOptions.title: عن هذا التطبيق
moreOptions.detail: UpLinkMarket is an online platform where you can buy and sell almost everything. The best deals are often done with people who lives nearby. It's a place where you can get everything

moreOptions.title: الأحكام والشروط
moreOptions.detail: Please be sure to read these Terms & Conditions before using this app.

moreOptions.title: سياسة خاصة
moreOptions.detail:
RadiusTheme.com – the UpLinkMarket mobile application creators – prioritizes and values the security and privacy of the information you share with us through our UpLinkMarket. We intend to make our users as comfortable using our app as possible. If you are to trust us with your information, you must understand how we collect, use, and maintain it.

When you are about to acquire Classim, you'll need to register with us. The registration gives us your First and Last Name and Email Address.

paras.paraDetail:
RadiusTheme.com – the UpLinkMarket mobile application creators – prioritizes and values the security and privacy of the information you share with us through our UpLinkMarket. We intend to make our users as comfortable using our app as possible. If you are to trust us with your information, you must understand how we collect, use, and maintain it.

When you are about to acquire UpLinkMarket, you'll need to register with us. The registration gives us your First and Last Name and Email Address.

We may require you to provide us with certain personal information for a better experience. This information includes but is not limited to, name, address, and location data. This information will only be accessible to us and will only be used as described in this privacy policy.

When you register and provide your name, email address, account username, and password, we will not retain your address information. Instead, this information is stored in 2Checkout – our payment gateway company.

We may also need extra information for support purposes, such as the URL of your site, admin, and FTP access. We only collect this data when you need extensive and effective support. All the data we receive for support requests is saved in Freshdesk, our third-party support system.
When you download UpLinkMarket, the same payment gateway collects your IP address and geo-location information.

When we offer support for our UpLinkMarket application, we don't store your email address even when you email us for support. We use the Freshdesk support system, which supports email communications and stores our users' usernames and email addresses. However, if necessary, we can import/ export the data.

If you have a website and need to use UpLinkMarket, you'll need to register with us, upon which we'll collect your personal information. This registration effectively makes you our customer and can download items from our site.

paras.paraTitle: What Is Your Data Used For?
paras.paraDetail: With the data stored with our support for the Freshdesk support system, we get to identify you as our customer and send notifications and updates. The information we send could be product releases, updates, and discount offers. Guest users – who haven't registered – don't have permission to take any actions on our websites. Therefore, as a valued customer, we trust you enough to allow you to perform these actions.

paras.paraTitle: For How Long is Personal Information Retained?
paras.paraDetail: When you register with us, your personal information and email are retained for the sake of future support. This information remains stored with us until you delete your personal information.

paras.paraTitle: What We Don't Do with Your Personal Information:
paras.paraDetail: We don't and will never disclose, share, or provide your private information with other companies to market their own services or products. It is also against our policy to share your personal information with unauthorized people.

As a registered user, it is within your rights to edit your personal information. You can also request that a file of your information be exported. Upon logging into our site, you can delete your data too.

Cookies are small files with little data that are often used for unique anonymous identification. The website you visit sends them to your browser and stores them on your device's internal memory.

Although our app or service may not use cookies explicitly, it may utilize third-party coding that uses them to collect information and improve their services. You will know when cookies are being sent to your device and have the option to accept or refuse cookies. However, rejecting cookies may deter you from accessing some services.

paras.paraTitle: Our Security Procedures Against Data Breaches:
paras.paraDetail:
We value the trust you've placed in us by giving us your personal information. Therefore, we employ industry-standard security means and technologies to protect your personal information from unauthorized disclosure, access, or use. Please don't disclose your registration password and username to unauthorized people to help us protect your privacy.

Even though no internet transmission method or electronic storage procedure is 100% watertight, RadiusTheme and UpLinkMarket leaves nothing to chance in efforts to protect your personal information.

In case your information is accessed by unauthorized people or is lost, we'll inform you as soon as we become aware of this.

paras.paraTitle: How to Access Your Data or Edit Your Personal Information:
paras.paraDetail: When you log in on our site with your details, all your account information will be available for you to edit or delete. If you want to stop email notifications for the UpLinkMarket app, just unsubscribe or send us an email, and we'll erase your email or account. Ensure that your email's subject reads 'delete my username'.
If you have any suggestions or questions about our privacy policy, please feel free to contact us via support@radiustheme.com.

termsAndConditions.paraData: UpLinkMarket is a mobile app service created and provided by radiustheme.com, subject to you agreeing with the Terms and Conditions outlined below. Please be sure to read these Terms & Conditions before using this app.

It is the responsibility of all advertisers and other users to ensure that all content (image, video, graphics, and text content) uploaded for inclusion on the platform complies with the relevant laws. UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com assumes no responsibility for any inaccuracy or illegality of the content posted.

Advertisers and all users guarantee that their content doesn't violate any copyright, intellectual property rights, or any other rights of any entity or person. The user or advertiser agrees to release UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com from all obligations, claims, and liabilities arising from or connected with the use or inability to use the service.

Advertisers agree to their content being presented through the partner sites of UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com, under the same terms and conditions as on UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com.

Advertisers effectively grant UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com a perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free, non-exclusive license and right to use, modify, reproduce, publish, adapt, translate, create derivative works from and distribute or incorporate such content into any form, technology, or medium now known or later developed.

The material (including the content, software, or services) on UpLinkMarket are the property of radiustheme.com, its affiliates, subsidiaries, and/or third-party licensors. All intellectual property rights, such as copyright, service marks, trademarks, trade names, and other distinguishing brands on UpLinkMarket, are the property of RadiusTheme.

No material found on UpLinkMarket or radiustheme.com may be copied, republished, reproduced, installed, transmitted, posted, stored, or distributed without written explicit permission from RadiusTheme.
All images on UpLinkMarket are watermark to prevent them from being reused for other purposes without the advertiser's permission.

UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com reserve the right to alter the title of any content on the app for editorial purposes. UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com reserve the right to refuse to publish inappropriate images or those that violate RadiusTheme's rules.

UpLinkMarket and RadiusTheme reserve the right to cooperate with the authorities in case any content on the app violates the law. The identity of users, buyers, or advertisers may be determined, for example, by an ISP. IP addresses may also be registered to ensure that all users, buyers, and advertisers comply with the terms and conditions.

UpLinkMarket and RadiusTheme will collect information from users, buyers, and advertisers. As a condition of use of UpLinkMarket, each user and advertiser consents to and authorizes UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com to collect and use this information. UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com also reserves the right to disclose the information to Company Affiliates and any other person for the purposes of supporting, administering, and maintaining UpLinkMarket, as well as for improving UpLinkMarket, for instance by using the information for marketing, research, planning, and product development.

This app may use cookies, which means that your device should be cookie-enabled. A cookie file contains information, such as a random user ID that the site automatically assigns to a visitor to track the pages they visit. Cookies can't read data off your hard disk or other cookie files from other sites. Cookies can't, by themselves, be used to figure out the identity of the user.

Users are needed to submit valid email addresses before they're allowed to post advertisement listings. The email addresses shall not be displayed publicly. However, users are allowed to send emails to other users through UpLinkMarket.
UpLinkMarket and radiustheme.com doesn't guarantee uninterrupted or secure access to the app. The app is provided on an 'as is' and as and when available basis.

UpLinkMarket may contain references and links to other sites (Third-Party Websites). However, UpLinkMarket or radiustheme.com shall not be responsible for the contents in these third-party websites. Third-party websites are not monitored or investigated by UpLinkMarket or radiustheme.com. Once a user decides to leave UpLinkMarket and access a third-party website, they do so at their own risk.

Some of the services and content of UpLinkMarket may require payment, including but not limited to; membership packages and posting of ads in some specific categories.

Users may buy ad promotions using vouchers sold or issued by UpLinkMarket. Vouchers aren't redeemable for cash.

Advertisers and other users may be required to transmit the information of their paid content via a third-party provider, which is governed by their own terms and conditions. Those users and advertisers accept such links at their own risk and UpLinkMarket disclaims all liability related thereto. UpLinkMarket shall, under no circumstances, be obliged to refund any payments made concerning paid content.

UpLinkMarket will create a shop on the user's behalf. The shop created will be devoid of content, pending the addition of the same by the user. UpLinkMarket has the right to any content added to the shop by the user and has the right to remove or decline to publish content that it deems inappropriate or violates any aspects of the terms and conditions.

UpLinkMarket reserves the right to change or modify membership packages, including their price and contents.

UpLinkMarket isn't obligated to refund services or money if a membership package is canceled early, for any reason whatsoever.

UpLinkMarket and radisutheme.com assume no responsibility whatsoever for the use of UpLinkMarket and disclaims all responsibility for any claim, injury, damage, or liability of any kind resulting from, or arising out of, or any way related to (a) any errors on UpLinkMarket or the Content, including but not limited to typographical errors and technical errors, (b) any third party websites or content directly or indirectly accessed or retrieved through links in UpLinkMarket, (c) the unavailability of UpLinkMarket, (d) your use of UpLinkMarket or the Content, or (e) your use of any equipment (or software) in connection with UpLinkMarket.

Advertisers and other users agree to indemnify UpLinkMarket and RadiusTheme as well as its employees, agents, officers, directors, from and against all expenses, losses, damages, and costs, including attorney's fees, arising from any violation of these Terms and Conditions (including negligent or wrongful conduct).

UpLinkMarket and RadiusTheme reserve the right to alter or modify these Terms and Conditions. Such alteration or modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting on UpLinkMarket. You are responsible for regularly reviewing for such modifications. Your continued access or use of UpLinkMarket shall be deemed to be your acceptance of the modified terms and conditions.
UpLinkMarket is operated under the laws and regulations of respective country.
